Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Syn-safencin-48 (AS-48 minimal domain analog, synthetic AMPs, Lys-rich, UCLL1)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, bacteria-derived, natural derivative

Literature.Author: Corman HN, Ross JN, Fields FR, Shoue DA, McDowell MA, Lee SW.2022
Literature.Title: Rationally Designed Minimal Bioactive Domains of AS-48 Bacteriocin Homologs Possess Potent Antileishmanial Properties.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (80.77%) toSyn-safencin-2K: 36%, A: 12%.Activity: exhibits leishmanicidal activity against L. donovani (IC50 1.75 uM).Toxicity: THP-1 cells (CC50 < 20 uM). eST4/2024
